channel.title: Cant use any client
channel.description:
this is what i get when i edit run:
@echo off COLOR 09 title Legendzz Client V2 java -Xmx1000m -cp pause
I have jada 11 btw. and when i log on it says:
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command operable program or batch file Press any key to continue...

item.title: Cant use any client
item.dc:creator: @visiblesound visiblesound
item.description:
@visiblesound wrote:

this is what i get when i edit run:

@echo off
COLOR 09
title Legendzz Client V2
java -Xmx1000m -cp
pause

I have jada 11 btw. and when i log on it says:

‘java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command
operable program or batch file
Press any key to continue…
